body: Why did best girl have to be done so badly by this dude. I think of all the hentai I have read this one had a story I was interested in. This is the embodiment of the meme I don't want to be horny anymore I want to be happy.
@Datenshi69 I agree and don't care why they broke up, But I hope https://nhentai.net/g/220708/ is this sequel even if it's a bit different

The first, second, third and more times I read this I thought it has a shitty ending. Few years laters I read all your comments and theories, and it still a shitty ending
1 there is no evidence that the school will close like in the anime
2 "the asshole took a picture of her while she gave him a paizuri without even asking for her permission", i mean we all read he did asking for her permission right? Or your cum made you blind. 
3 He got no money and he couldn't fix his phone, so he took a picture of her paizuri, sold it, made some money, fixed his phone and then they broke up, right? Nope, he didn't fix his phone as we see at the end, so that's means he didn't sell any photo, and didn't get any money. "But he did took the picture, sold it, got the money but didn't fixed his phone because he felt bad" you can make all the theories you want but the author didn't left ANYYY LEADS. Not only one
4 in only one page it went from paizuri to a haha sad
5 who cared anyways, it's a good p a j a

An explaination of why they broke would make this a lot better. The sudden break up is just a cheap way to make a sad ending.

Some people assume that the first years of youth are just a phase, and anything done on them are just memories to be remembered but not taken as serious decisions to the adult life.

Yes, it's a stupid way to think, and in most cases those are just self excuses to be careless and selfish, but it's a common way of thinking and probably will ever be.
